lines.text: Possibly there are more things in heaven and Earth than are dreamed of in your psychiatry, Mr. Garth.

Be thou exorcised oh Dracula, and thy body long undead find destruction throughout eternity in the name of thy dark unholy Master. In the name of the oh holiest and through this cross be the evil spirit cast out until the end of time
Where's Janet?
Safe - so far.
If you've harmed her.
You're not in London now Doctor Garth with your police. You're in Transylvania in my castle.
[on the phone]
Yes? Dr.Garth speaking. Well who is this? What do you want?
[in a false German accent]
Please come right away.This is the zoo speaking.
The what? The zoo?
Ja! One of our elephants is seeing pink men!
All right.Now listen to me,Janet,this has gone far enough! Well,there's nothing funny about it!I'm in the midst of a very serious...
[Janet hangs up and laughs]
HELLO?
[hangs up]
Sandor, look at me. What do you see in my eyes?
Death.
Sherry, Marya?
Thank you, I never drink... wine.
Why are you looking at me that way? Will I do?
Yes, you'll do very well indeed. Do you like jewels, Lily? It's very old and very beautiful, I'll show it to you.
I think I'll pass tonight. I think I'll go if you don't mind... Please don't come any closer!
[She then screams]
Her pulse is weak Dr. Garth... Growing weaker. All your skill can't help her now. She's under a spell that can be broken only by me... or death.
You know, this is the first woman's flat I've been in that didn't have at least 20 mirrors in it.

[comes out of Dracula's castle]
Some man is in there with a stake through his heart.
Scary.

[looks at Van Helsing]
You know anything about this?
Yes, I did it.
Who is he in there?
His name's Count Dracula.
How long has he been dead?
About 500 years.
